<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15358</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Altre istituzioni europee</string>
            <string language="en">Other EU Institutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Andere EU Anstalten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">d'Autres Établissements d'EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Outras Instituições do EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλα Όργανα της ΕΕ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Otras Instituciones del EU</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo è un esercizio interattivo di abbinamento su altre istituzioni europee ( Corte di Giustizia, Comitato Economico e Sociale, Corte dei Conti, ecc.) che hanno ruoli chiave nel far funzionare l'UE.</string>
            <string language="en">This is an interactive matching exercise about other EU institutions ( The Court of Justice, The European Economic and Social Committee, The Court of Auditors, etc.) which have key roles in making the EU work</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Istituzioni europee</string>
            <string language="en">EU institutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">cittadinanza europea</string>
            <string language="en">European citizenship</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine interaktive zusammenpassende 
Übung über andere EU-Anstalten (den Gerichtshof, der europäische 
Wirtschafts- und Sozialausschuß, das Gericht der Revisoren, usw..) 
welche Schlüsselrollen haben, wenn sie die EU-Arbeit bilden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un exercice assorti interactif au sujet 
d'autres établissements d'EU (la Cour de Justice, de Comité 
économique et social européen, de Cour des comptes, etc...) ce
qui ont les rôles principaux en faisant le travail d'EU</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um exercício combinando interativo sobre
outras instituições do EU (a corte de justiça, o comitê econômico
e social europeu, a corte de revisores de contas, etc..) quais 
têm os papéis chaves em fazer o trabalho do EU</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια διαλογική ταιριάζοντας με άσκηση για 
άλλα όργανα της ΕΕ (το Δικαστήριο, η ευρωπαϊκή 
Οικονομική και Κοινωνική Επιτροπή, το Ελεγκτικό Συνέδριο, 
κ.λπ....) όποιοι έχουν τους βασικούς ρόλους στην παραγωγή 
της εργασίας της ΕΕ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un ejercicio que corresponde con 
interactivo sobre otras instituciones del EU (el Tribunal de Justicia,
el Comité Económico y Social europeo, Tribunal de Cuentas, los etc.)
cuáles tienen papeles dominantes en la fabricación del trabajo
del EU</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EU-Anstalten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europäische Staatsbürgerschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Établissements d'EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Citoyenneté européenne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instituições do EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Citizenship europeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όργανα της ΕΕ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρωπαϊκή υπηκοότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Instituciones del EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudadanía europea</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">11-18</string>
            <string language="en">11-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Obiettivo:- gli alunni dimostreranno conoscenza di altre istituzioni europee (enti, agenzie) come: Corte di Giustizia, Comitato Economico e Sociale, Corte dei Conti, ecc. Metodo didattico: lettura attiva ( leggere e svolgere un esercizio interattivo) e feedback rapido. Strumento di presentazione dei contenuti: pagina web ( testo e link). Strumento di valutazione: esercizio di abbinamento, con limite di tempo e feed back rapido</string>
            <string language="en">Objective: - pupils will demonstrate knowledge of other EU institutions (bodies, agencies)such as:  The Court of Justice, The European Economic and Social Committee, The Court of Auditors, etc. 
Teaching method: active learning (reading + doing an interactive exercise) and rapid feedback Content presentation tool: web page (text and hyperlinks) Assessment tool: matching exercise with a time limit and rapid feedback</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
